programme.title: Faisla
programme.desc: Three cruel and heartless convicts escape from prison to avenge the rape and death of one of their daughters. However, a turn of events leads them to committing other heinous crimes.

programme.title: April Fool
programme.desc: Ashok, a prankster, loves pulling off practical jokes. Each April Fool`s day, he simply outdoes himself. But one such joke gets him and Madhu in so much trouble that they have to run for their lives.

programme.title: Dastaan-E-Rafi
programme.desc: Dastaan-E-Rafi explores the life of legendary singer Mohd. Rafi through memories.

programme.title: Yari Dushmani
programme.desc: Shankar and Birju, orphaned friends, face betrayal and greed after looting a wedding. As Shankar seeks revenge and diamonds, tension rises with dacoits and their complicated past.

programme.title: Razia Sultan
programme.desc: Razia Sultan, the first female ruler of the Delhi Sultanate, lands in trouble and loses her kingdom when she falls in love with Jamal-ud-Din Yakut, an Abyssinian slave.

programme.title: Tamacha
programme.desc: After years, when childhood best friends Raju and Vicky unite, they have a showdown as one becomes a cop and the other is a notorious criminal, who find themselves on the opposite sides of the law.

programme.title: Allah Rakha
programme.desc: Street urchin Allah Rakha discovers that his parents are alive and that the family was separated by a mafia don. He sets out for revenge.

programme.title: Kasam Suhaag Ki
programme.desc: A wounded serpent seeks revenge on the killers of her husband. Does she finally manage to succeed in her mission?

programme.title: Kalicharan
programme.desc: Kalicharan a criminal serving a life sentence is given bail to take place of late Inspector as he resembles him.

programme.title: Sabak
programme.desc: A story of a police Sub-Inspector. It tells of how he goes about single-handed to smash a notorious smugglers gang to avenge the murder of his Brother.

programme.title: Jhanak Jhanak Payal Baaje
programme.desc: Dance maestro Mangal pairs Neela with his son, Girdhar, for a competition. As their romance blossoms, they become distracted, jeopardizing their performance and Mangal`s hopes for their success.

programme.title: Shree 420
programme.desc: Raj is a naive man who comes to Mumbai to fulfil his dreams. However, he gets influenced by a conniving man who promises the world to him.

programme.title: Dhan Daulat
programme.desc: A man is forced to end a relationship, unaware that his lover is pregnant. Later, father and son meet but will they discover each other`s identities?

programme.title: Sanjog
programme.desc: Asha`s life turns upside down when she realizes that her guardians are not her real parents and her real mother is mentally ill.

programme.title: Ganga Tere Desh Mein
programme.desc: Inspector Ajay arrests a mentally disturbed gangster. Intrigued by his own mother`s kindness towards the culprit, Ajay decides to find out the truth, which may change his outlook towards life.

programme.title: Main Tulsi Tere Aangan Ki
programme.desc: The story of a woman who switched roles from being a prostitute to being a most loving mother to a child who is not even her own.

programme.title: Karz
programme.desc: Monty uncovers the truth about his past life, discovering he was killed by his gold-digger wife while his family was left homeless. With his lover`s support, he seeks justice.

programme.title: Do Phool
programme.desc: A wealthy man disowns his two irresponsible sons. One of them plays a prank by claiming that he has murdered his brother.

programme.title: Saaransh
programme.desc: A retired school teacher and his wife come to terms with life after the death of their only son in a senseless mugging incident.

programme.title: Aakhri Dao
programme.desc: Ravi, a reformed burglar, builds a new life but is tempted back into crime when an old partner offers him a dangerous job, threatening his redemption.

programme.title: Woh 7 Din
programme.desc: Dr Anand learns that his new bride loves someone else. He decides to re-unite the two lovers at all costs and begins to search for the man.

programme.title: Alag Alag
programme.desc: A village belle marries an older doctor for his money, while singer Neeraj moves in with a movie starlet in the hope of getting more work. However, unexpected events occur and change their lives.

programme.title: Qayamat
programme.desc: Two close friends turn into foes when they grow up, as one turns into a criminal and the other, an IPS Officer.

programme.title: Satyam Shivam Sundaram
programme.desc: Rajeev falls for Roopa, a beautiful singer concealing half her disfigured face. After marriage, he discovers her secret and starts to ignore her, leading to emotional turmoil in their relationship.

programme.title: Bombay To Goa
programme.desc: Mala, a young girl, witnesses a murder and boards a bus bound for Goa to escape from the killer. As a result, she meets exciting people from different cultures who make her journey adventurous.

programme.title: Aap To Aise Na The
programme.desc: A man loses the love of his life to the best friend he owes all his success to. Can he win her back or did she not love him at all?

programme.title: Dada
programme.desc: When a young, simple boy witnesses a shoot-out of a don and manages to save his life, the don trains him to be his successor.

programme.title: Itihaas (1987)
programme.desc: Joginder, an honest police commissioner, is instrumental in arresting Alexander, a dreaded gangster. Alexander is granted bail by the court and as revenge he molests Joginder`s daughter Jyoti.

programme.title: Kudrat
programme.desc: Choudry Janak Singh, a man she hasn`t met before, is the face in Chandramukhi`s nightmares. Can Naresh,a psychiatrist, help her?

programme.title: Mere Jeevan Saathi
programme.desc: An artist loses his eyesight in a tragic accident and is helped by a stranger. He later discovers the woman he loves is set to marry the same man who helped him.

programme.title: Hafta Vasuli
programme.desc: Lotiram Khabadia, a corrupt MLA, teams up with gangster Tamancha to win elections but faces defeat from Chayavati. Betrayed, he plans revenge, risking everything to testify.

programme.title: Andheri Raat Mein Diya Tere Haath Mein
programme.desc: Two friends dive into the underworld for riches and luxury. But when one sees the dark side of their choices, he yearns for a more normal, fulfilling life.

programme.title: Batwara
programme.desc: Amidst the fall of princely states in post-independence India, the friendship between aristocrat Vikram and a peasant is tested. Vikram turns vengeful after his brother is killed in a peasant colony.
